product_name: Lowepro Photo Hatchback 22L AW Camera Pack
long_description: The sleek Lowepro Photo Hatchback 22L AW camera pack offers a casual, yet high-performance design for carrying camera gear, a tablet and creature comforts on your outdoor excursions. Removable, padded camera box with stormflap closure and grab handles offers storage for a complete camera kit; remove it to convert the bag into a fully functional daypack. Body-side hatchback opening provides easy and secure access to your camera gear. Padded, front stash pocket offers quick access to a dual compartment that fits a tablet or compact laptop; stretch-mesh side pockets offer storage for water bottles. Padded, mesh-covered back panel provides soft, breathable comfort for all-day fun. Built-in memory card pocket supplies a convenient place to stash spare memory. Multiple adjustment points at the shoulders, sternum and waist offer a comfortable fit. Attachment loops on shoulder straps expand carrying capacity; webbing grab handle provides an extra way to carry pack. The Lowepro Photo Hatchback 22L AW camera pack includes a patented, all-weather cover that helps protect gear from the elements.
short_description: The sleek Lowepro Photo Hatchback 22L AW camera pack offers a casual, yet high-performance design for carrying camera gear, a tablet and creature comforts on your outdoor excursions.
